nodes.name: Decision making process
nodes.text:
Decision making process

Eventually, you do plan to have dinosaurs on your dinosaur tour, right? God creates dinosaurs. God destroys dinosaurs. God creates Man. Man destroys God. Man creates Dinosaurs. Hey, you know how I'm, like, always trying to save the planet? Here's my chance.

nodes.name: Stakeholder engagement
nodes.text:
Stakeholder engagment

Hey, you know how I'm, like, always trying to save the planet? Here's my chance. Yes, Yes, without the oops! Hey, you know how I'm, like, always trying to save the planet? Here's my chance. We gotta burn the rain forest, dump toxic waste, pollute the air, and rip up the OZONE! 'Cause maybe if we screw up this planet enough, they won't want it anymore!

nodes.name: Analytical support
nodes.text:
Analytical support

Forget the fat lady! You're obsessed with the fat lady! Drive us out of here! Must go faster. Jaguar shark! So tell me - does it really exist? What do they got in there? King Kong? Yes, Yes, without the oops! Yeah, but John, if The Pirates of the Caribbean breaks down, the pirates donâ€™t eat the tourists.

nodes.name: Standards and frameworks
nodes.text:
Standards and frameworks

Yeah, but your scientists were so preoccupied with whether or not they could, they didn't stop to think if they should. Yes, Yes, without the oops! We gotta burn the rain forest, dump toxic waste, pollute the air, and rip up the OZONE! 'Cause maybe if we screw up this planet enough, they won't want it anymore!

nodes.name: Case making
nodes.text: The casemaking phase is about the reasoning/ justification for a different policy or instrument. It provides direction of what the future institution or reform could deliver if implemented. The proposal needs to demonstrate that it is aligned with the strategic goal of the country.
nodes.output:
Output

Mapping of the current financial landscape.

Low carbon agenda including targets.

Total infrastructure financing requirement, green requirements by sector.

Determine the missing markets.

The objective of the GIB and proposal for its functions, based on the finance strategy (above points) and market barriers.

Market testing (finance, government, NGOs, political parties).
